Hi {!Contact.FirstName} !
Thank you for taking the time to speak with me earlier. As requested I have included additional information about Lighthouse 360 and our Certified Partner Program.
Lighthouse 360, automates a practice's daily consumer interactions and office routine such as appointment reminders, leading to improved operational efficiency and business results.
The features include phone, text, email, and postcard appointment automation, reactivation letters, family messages, patient reviews, seamless practice management integration, all-day data synchronization, and more!
By partnering up with Lighthouse , you can:
Build a Recurring Attractive Revenue Channel. Share Marketing and Business Knowledge. Add Strategic Value to your Customer Base. Leverage Sales, Service and Marketing Best Practices and Support.
For more information please visit: http://www.lh360.com/partner-programs
Thank you again for your interest!
